subject: Lockerbie bombing appeal granted
body:
Abdelbasset al-Megrahi, the only man convicted of the 1988 bombing of a Pan-Am jet over Lockerbie, Scotland, is granted a second appeal.

For more details: http://www.bbc.co.uk/news
